page.title: 166 YEAR OLD SAM.
page.content: My name is Sam Limb.I am 6 years old.I live at Langwith with my Mum and Dad and my 10 year old brother Adam.I go on a bus to Langwith Bassett School.I go home in a Mini Metro car.There are 18 children in my class.I like doing my Maths best.I like working on the computer.My favourite dinner is hot dogs and crisps.Last week we went on a trip to Twycross Zoo to see wild animals that live far away in other countries. My daddy works at Warsop pit.He makes the cage that carries the men,go up and down the shaft.My mummy works at the Co-op for 3 days and at the garage for 2 days.We are going to Scotland for a holiday.When I was 5,I went to Greece on an aeroplane for a holiday.
